headline: London's Premier
Tattoo Experience
hero.subheadline: Custom designs crafted with precision in the heart of Soho. Where traditional artistry meets contemporary vision.
hero.imageAlt: Professional tattoo artist working on custom design at Frith Street Tattoo

portfolio.subtitle: Every tattoo tells a story. Here are some of our recent masterpieces.

sessions.subtitle: Choose the perfect session for your vision
sessions.guarantee: 100% satisfaction guarantee or your deposit back

testimonials.quote: Marcus created the most incredible sleeve for me. The attention to detail and artistry is unmatched. Couldn't be happier with the result.
testimonials.author: Sarah Thompson

testimonials.quote: The studio atmosphere is perfect - professional, clean, and welcoming. My geometric piece turned out exactly as I envisioned.
testimonials.author: James Mitchell

paragraphs: Marcus Reid has been creating exceptional tattoos for over 15 years, establishing Frith Street Tattoo as one of London's most respected studios. His passion for both traditional techniques and contemporary innovation has earned him recognition across the UK tattoo community.

Specializing in custom designs that blend classical artistry with modern aesthetics, Marcus works closely with each client to bring their vision to life. Every piece is approached with meticulous attention to detail and a commitment to artistic excellence.
about.callout: Every tattoo is a collaboration between artist and client, resulting in truly unique pieces of wearable art.
about.imageAlt: Marcus Reid, lead artist at Frith Street Tattoo, in his London studio

items.question: How far in advance should I book?
items.answer: We typically book 2-4 weeks in advance, depending on the size and complexity of your desired tattoo. Consultations can usually be scheduled within a week.

items.question: What's included in the consultation?
items.answer: Your consultation includes design discussion, sizing, placement advice, and a custom sketch. We'll also cover aftercare instructions and answer any questions you have about the process.

finalCta.headline: Ready to Start Your Tattoo Journey?
finalCta.subheadline: Book your consultation today and let's create something extraordinary together.

booking.modalDescription: Tell us about your tattoo idea and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to schedule your consultation.
booking.successMessage: We've received your booking request and will contact you within 24 hours to confirm your consultation time.
booking.depositDisclaimer: A £50 deposit will be required to secure your appointment, fully refundable if cancelled 48 hours in advance.
